name: Bug Fights: The Furnace
description:
Combine your bug cards in the furnace to join bugs into unique combinations. 

How to play:

  • Click and drag cards onto the field to place units
  • Drag cards into the furnace on the right to join units in different ways
  • Click Start on the bottom right to begin a fight!

Tips:

  • Mosquitos increase attack speed
  • Mantis increase attack power
  • Eggs increase health
  • Maggots increase movement speed

Art assets by:

  • Kenney
  • Cheshire - Insect bases
